channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Wyden: AT&T, T-Mobile, and Verizon weren’t notifying senators of surveillance requests
item.description: Sen. Ron Wyden said in a letter that one U.S. phone carrier turned over Senate data to law enforcement without notifying the target.

item.title: Jony Ive to lead OpenAI’s design work following $6.5B acquisition of his company
item.description: OpenAI is acquiring io, the device startup that CEO Sam Altman and famed Apple designer Jony Ive have quietly been working on for two years, in an all...

item.title: OpenAI's Big Bet That Jony Ive Can Make AI Hardware Work
item.description: Io, a firm Ive and Sam Altman cocreated, will now merge with OpenAI.

item.title: 8 Best Mattresses for Side Sleepers Plus Helpful Buying Advice (2025)
item.description: I’m a side sleeper, and I tested 50 of the top hybrid, memory foam, and cooling mattresses to find the best combination of support and pressure relief...

item.title: Spotify’s new ‘Upcoming Releases’ hub highlights future albums you may like
item.description: Spotify is launching a new hub dedicated to keeping users informed about soon-to-be-released albums, the company announced on Wednesday. The hub, call...

item.title: Spotify says support for external payments on iOS has already boosted subscriptions
item.description: Spotify says its ability to direct its customers to external payment links in its iOS app has already had a positive impact on sales. In a newly filed...

item.title: The Enhanced Games Has a Date, a Host City, and a Drug-Fueled World Record
item.description: The Enhanced Games, where athletes are allowed to take performance-enhancing drugs, will host its first event in May. One “enhanced” former Olympic sw...

item.title: LM Arena, the organization behind popular AI leaderboards, lands $100M
item.description: LM Arena, a crowdsourced benchmarking project that major AI labs rely on to test and market their AI models, has raised $100 million in a seed funding...

item.title: Google’s Android Chief Hopes Its ‘New Era’ Will Get People to Ditch Their iPhones
item.description: Android is getting a design refresh, launching a mixed reality platform for smart glasses, and Gemini is expanding to cars and watches. Can it entice ...

item.title: FEMA Has Canceled Its 4-Year Strategic Plan Ahead of Hurricane Season
item.description: Multiple FEMA employees tell WIRED that they did not know of another time when a strategic plan was rescinded without another in place.
